name: 2024 9th International Conference on Multimedia Systems and Signal Processing
content: Publication: The accepted paper will be published into the ICMSSP 2024 Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1691-1), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
